scripts.build: npm run cleanup && npm run mkdirs && npm run compile-assets
scripts.prod: npm run cleanup && npm run mkdirs && npm run compile-assets-prod
scripts.watch-css: npm run cleanup-css && npm run watching-css
scripts.watch-js: npm run cleanup-js && npm run watching-js
scripts.cleanup: npm run cleanup-css && npm run cleanup-js && npm run mkdirs
scripts.compile-assets: npm run compile-css && npm run compile-js
scripts.compile-assets-prod: npm run compile-css-prod && npm run compile-js-prod
